title: FandangoSEO
description:
FandangoSEO is a cloud-based tool designed to run complete SEO audits effortlessly. It monitors the Website’s performance 24/7, alerting about any metric change so that you can avoid Google penalties. 
The fast SEO Crawler, Log Analyzer, and Competitive Analysis tool enables you to perform in-depth technical SEO audits.
FandangoSEO is an intuitive and visual tool that makes SEO data analysis easy.
